channel.title: How to make own porgramming language
channel.description: how do i make my own programming language. do i need to know one? which? and how much of it? wht would i need? i want to use it to make another game. thanku

item.title: How to make own porgramming language
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Make a script parser, and make the script parser convert the script (translate) into whichever languages you want, and get that language’s native compiler to do the fukhax.

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:5, topic:136553”][quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=188080.msg1698657#msg1698657 date=1187999048]
Step 1: Spell “programming” correctly
Step 2: Come back to this after you finish step one, which we all know will never happen.
[/quote]
Step 3: Learn Java Or C/C++ etc. In my opinion, they’d be the best.[/quote]
C#, VB.NET, VB 4-6, MS Visual C++, Python, Perl, PHP, etc. would all be good for a language interpreter

Read full topic
item.source: How to make own porgramming language

item.title: How to make own porgramming language
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:5, topic:136553”][quote author=Javacisnotrecognized link=topic=188080.msg1698657#msg1698657 date=1187999048]
Step 1: Spell “programming” correctly
Step 2: Come back to this after you finish step one, which we all know will never happen.
[/quote]
Step 3: Learn Java Or C/C++ etc. In my opinion, they’d be the best.[/quote]
Step 4: If you want a good language, learn Assembly.

Also don’t make a completly new language just for a game…a scripting language maybe, but no need to reinvent the wheel.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make own porgramming language
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

I started a language before. Parsing is a bitch, I mean it’s fine when you get simple functions down but when you have complex nested if statements with variables it turns into a big fucking hemroid. The best way is to take an existing language like vb and write a dll for it in another language.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make own porgramming language

item.title: How to make own porgramming language
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Making you’re own programming langauge, i imagine would be extremely hard, of course it would help to already know a large amount of other languages such as java, c/c++.

If you are just starting off, then wanting to make you’re own programming langauge is jumping into the really deep end.

Read full topic
